info.title: Joint Operating Agreement
info.description: The service contains Joint Operating Agreement, Description, Equity Group, Penalty Category Recovery Percentage and Partner Share nodes. The information is sent in the request as a payload, which is used in creating or updating a Joint Operating Agreement, including appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations. If there are any issues when the Joint Operating Agreement is created, updated or deleted, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Maintain Joint Operating Agreement using this inbound service
